training_program.name: MMA Conditioning and Techniques
training_program.description: This program focuses on conditioning and techniques for MMA fighters.
training_program.position_focus: Strength, Endurance, and Martial Arts Skills

training_sets.name: Bag Work
training_sets.description: Practice striking techniques on the heavy bag to improve power and precision.

training_sets.name: Grappling Drills
training_sets.description: Train grappling techniques and transitions with partner drills.

training_sets.name: Sparring Sessions
training_sets.description: Engage in controlled sparring sessions to apply techniques in a live scenario.

training_set.name: Warm-up Routine
training_set.description: Start with a dynamic warm-up routine to prepare the body for training.
